Description: A creamy and spicy chicken dish
Instructions:
1. Marinate chicken in yogurt and spices
2. Grill chicken until charred
3. Make sauce with onions, tomatoes, and cream
4. Combine chicken with sauce
5. Simmer until thickened

1. Marinate chicken in spices
2. Cook chicken in tandoor or grill
3. Prepare rich tomato-based sauce
4. Add cream and butter
5. Combine and simmer

Description: Layered rice with meat and spices
Instructions:
1. Marinate meat with spices
2. Par-cook rice
3. Layer rice and meat
4. Add saffron and herbs
5. Dum cook for 30 minutes

1. Mix flour, yeast, and water
2. Knead for 10 minutes
3. Let rise for 2 hours
4. Shape into flatbreads
5. Cook on hot griddle

1. Mix milk powder and flour
2. Add ghee and make dough
3. Shape into small balls
4. Fry until golden brown
5. Soak in sugar syrup

1. Make fresh paneer
2. Knead paneer until smooth
3. Shape into balls
4. Cook in sugar syrup
5. Serve chilled

1. Soak lentils overnight
2. Cook in pressure cooker
3. Add cream and butter
4. Simmer until creamy
5. Garnish with cream

1. Marinate paneer in spices
2. Thread on skewers
3. Grill until charred
4. Serve with chutney

1. Make dough with flour and oil
2. Prepare potato-pea filling
3. Shape into triangles
4. Fry until golden
5. Serve hot

1. Cook rice in milk
2. Add sugar and cardamom
3. Cook until thickened
4. Add nuts and saffron
5. Serve chilled
